column2: Immunoprecipitation of RNA-binding Proteins  in _S. cerevisiae_

I used chemical labeling (DML) and label-free mass spectrometry sample preparation protocols on several projects

column2: Network-based Assignment of RNA-Binding Proteins' Functionality
column7: Functionality was inferred from associations with annotations at the domain, molecular function, and pathway levels.
column8: Function-based networks were created from quantitative proteomics data and made accessible through an interactive, user-friendly web interface.
column9: __Keywords:__ Network | Functional analysis | Pfam | GO | KEGG | R Shiny

column7: _M. musculus_ proteome changes were investigated after infection with _Leishmania_.

column2: Embryonic Development Proteome Profiling of _Xenopus_ Species

column2: Scoring Function for RNA-Seq Differential Expression Assessment
